website_summaries.verdict: This electric stapler comes from a reliable maker and offers the ease of battery power.
pros: Can be powered by batteries or plugged into the wall
Holds a full strip of staples
cons: Does not perform as fast as others on the market

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This stapler does not work for the long term. works gook but the motor wears out after 6 months. starts going slower and slower. it says it will do 25+ but it never did. I bought a bostitch MDS20-BLK comes with a electric cord made for 20+ papers The bostitch stapler is a strong unit. I'm not much of a reviewer but I had to say something. SAVE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Rissyroo2

customer_reviews.title: This stapler stinks
customer_reviews.text: In March 2019, the behemoth electric stapler I had for the past 20 years finally died. After an appropriate period of mourning, I selected this stapler to try to take its place. This stapler stinks. Although it is rated for 20 sheets, it jams ALL THE TIME. Basically, you are taking the life of your documents in your hands if you try to staple more than 10 pages at a time. I wish I could return it, but I am stuck with this inferior contraption and the sweet sweet memory of the stapler was taken from me too soon.
customer_reviews.author: copperdiem

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Waste Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model that works great. This one I bought jams every time. It is basically a paper weight. I just can't find myself throwing it away because I paid so much for this product. Too bad the window to return this product is closed or I would have returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: Great size, no special staples needed
customer_reviews.text: This is similar in size to most standard ones, fits perfectly on my smaller desk, 4 diff settings for staple position is nice to have. Most of all I like using regular staples and not a ridiculous cartridge that's a nuisance to change and expensive to replace. Wish I got this a few years ago based on how much stapling I do each day. Little pricey but worth every cent, battery backup also a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Reeds

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well at all
customer_reviews.text: This stapler doesn't work well at all. One has to move the corner of the paper in and out in order to get a staple to drive into the paper. Then, the staple arrives too far from the corner where one wants it. This is extremely flimsy, and feels like it would easily break, if it fell from the height of a standard desk. I suppose it is my fault for not checking to see if there is a way to manually drive a staple, as with other similar staplers. The capacity of staples is also much less than one would expect, given the size of the stapler. I'm very disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Flakne

customer_reviews.title: I was not very smart about listening to others
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine from Amazon. Unfortunately, it is a lemon. The slide for loading staples is bent. It will not retract for loading Swingline staples. And when I loaded my batteries, it started stapling without being asked. And it would not stop. I tried again. This time I spent time carefully retracting the slide with pliers, every so gently. I loaded the staples. I loaded the batteries. Without being asked the stapler stapled continuously until all the staples had been used, and then continued to work without staples. I ignored the recent reviews. I was not very smart about listening to others. Now I will spend another $40 for a stapler that has good reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Castle

customer_reviews.title: Swingline Junk
customer_reviews.text: So, I have used this stapler style for about 4 years. About 6 months ago my 4 year old one kaputted on me. So I bought another one, and it went kaput within 2 months. Now I am on my 2nd replacement in 5 months and my current one is only 3 months old and the motor is going out. It only staples about 1/2 the time. Used to be a good product but won't be buying again after 2 misses.
customer_reviews.author: AWL4Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Staple compartment flies out occasionally.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is pretty okay overall, but not the best. It goes kinda wonky when I change out the staples, sometimes the staple compartment won't go back in securely even though I push it in properly & will fly out when I try to use it. But this only happens right after refilling it. It doesn't hold very many staples. It is also a bit loud. But none of these things bother me THAT much on the daily.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great stapler! Does a good job with 10-15 pages and light weight. My only nit picky things is that the paper has to be squared up with the stapler in order to activate the machine. I like to put the paper in at an angle(triangular corner). Paper must be inserted at right angle.
customer_reviews.author: SHON DUNCAN

customer_reviews.title: Worthy buy
customer_reviews.text: EDIT broke after 3 months of use.... completely irresponsive. No trouble with it so far, my only complaint is that the compartment that holds the staples is much smaller than ones I have been used to. This electric stapler replaced the one I had been using for 10 years. I am not sure if maybe all of the new ones have a smaller compartment... or whether this one is just smaller. But I am having to put in staples much more frequently. Other than that, it's done what it's supposed to do!
customer_reviews.author: Yvettebam

customer_reviews.title: Not So Great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work and it is not very good for a fast paced enviroment. It is rather slow so therefore I took it home for home use and it works perfectly for when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this thing really does work like a breeze. It is so much easier than any other stapler I have used. I can staple a bunch of paper together with no problem. It is very strong and light. My hand held was heavy and could only staple 4 papers without screwing up. This is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Trudi Hochman

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I work in a very fast paced environment and this works great for me. It staples very quick, but it's not as quiet as stated in the description. Also, I wish there was a manual function so I didn't have to keep moving the bar back and forth. Majority of what I staple is far down the paper, but I also use it pushed all the way to the front (it's rare) and it would be nice not to have to move it for that one thing and then have to move it right back, if that makes any sense. It's not a big deal or anything, just annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Cortney

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Carpal Tunnel Patients
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I have carpal tunnel syndrome and my line of work requires me to staple pages repeatly all day long (about 100 times per day), so I figured this could help me out some. I'm SO glad I got this product. It's been 3 weeks now and it works great, uses regular staples and my hands are much happier :)
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Sparkles

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for the office, where we probably went through 2-3 manual staplers (which all broke) in the past year. I thought maybe a part of the problem was that we have 10+ people picking it up and pressing on it at various amounts of pressure and decided to try automatic for a change. After almost three months, it's still going without a problem. We probably use it over 200 times a week and we still haven't changed the battery. We did notice it has to be reloaded more often because the chamber is much smaller than manual stapler (the motor takes up the space.) For the amount of work that is required, it suffices.
customer_reviews.author: S. N.

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money
customer_reviews.text: This electric stapler lasted only 6 months before it jammed so bad it was no longer operable. The insert that slides in and holds the staples got stuck inside the stapler. Could not get it opened. Save your money and get a better, more expensive stapler that's not disposable.
customer_reviews.author: Southonbeach

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for a while (A couple of months). Then it would not work on batteries, We took it apart and found that the battery connector was no longer making contact due to very weak materials. "Fixed" somewhat and it worked again. Then the depth adjuster would randomly change positions. Very poor quality materials. Works on AC power except for depth adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Two staplers not working.
customer_reviews.text: It never worked. I used the proper staples and it sticks whenever I try to use it. I reordered another black coloured one and it does the same thing. Before ordering these two black ones, I purchased a blue coloured one and it gives good service. In fact, that is the reason I ordered another one deciding to change the colour. Apparently, there is something wrong with the black cloured staplers.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler out there
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved these never waste time again pulling out staples that never went through three sheets of paper. The stapler uses every staple without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: hazel thompson

customer_reviews.title: Sensor Issue
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I got a defective device but whatever senses that there is paper in the mouth isn't cutting it. I've tried every technique to no avail. I end up having to jam it in there or take it out and put it back in several times before it will staple. Also, I've not gotten it to do 20 sheets. Maybe 10 sheets. It's jams with anymore. It doesn't hold very many staples either. It's priced well which is why I chose it I would not recommend this for an office stapler. Two stars because it is small and compact.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely poor quality. It has very little power. I would expect this if it were running on battery power, but it is plugged into an electrical socket. It hesitates when you insert pages to be stapled. It is quite loud as well. The channel for the staples is very hard to slide out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sensor stops working
customer_reviews.text: I bought three and two of the three stopped working after a few months. We don’t use it much just wanted it to looks nice on our desk. I change the batteries put different staples and it still didn’t work. The sensor just staples when it wants to.
customer_reviews.author: BTRFLii

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: The adjustable size switch never stays in place. I staple hundreds of items a day and I have to slide the red switch everytime because it always slides. I have had this same stapler before from another store and it never did this
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Stapler
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst stapler I've ever had. It doesn't work half the time and I just realized the staples are a different style and size so I have a mountain of staples I can't even use now, the old stapler I had was awesome. Unfortunately it looks like I've missed the window to return this piece of junk and at over $40 it was not cheap!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly J.

customer_reviews.title: The last stapler you'll ever want to own!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stapler! Easy, convenient, works well and no more trying to find an outlet to plug it in. I just wish I'd gotten this battery-operated stapler years ago!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery operated stapler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my desk work. It never worked. When my son-in-law came to check it out, the battery had exploded inside. He said I loaded it incorrectly. Probably my fault, but it was a loss of the money I paid for it. You said I couldn't return the stapler so I ordered a manual one to take its place. That one works perfectly. Old Grandmas like me shouldn't mess with a battery stapler and just stick to the old tried and true ones. Jeannine Noe
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine L. Noe

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: This is actually the second one I bought. The first one died after nine months so I'm not sure they are durable, but I like how quick and quietly it staples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy tableside stapler
customer_reviews.text: Easy to load, operate and sturdy too. Can't beat the price either!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn B.

customer_reviews.title: Handy and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It doesn’t staple large stacks but I have a regular staple I saved for that. So handy! I have arthritis and love it so I have one less thing to do that hurts my hands!
customer_reviews.author: Lori L

customer_reviews.title: most awful item
customer_reviews.text: the product does not work. twice I got the same stapler and put in new batteries and it does not work. most horrible item I have ever bought. I threw it in the garbage. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this even after reading the reviews and used it about 10 times before it quit working. New batteries, staples in it and not jammed, but nothing happens.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon A. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Amazinggggg stapler!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best electric stapler even tho they didn’t send me the right color i love it ! Highly recommended for a busy medical office or daily jobs!
customer_reviews.author: victor s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Stapler
customer_reviews.text: Still looking at this new electric stapler. You have to put in part of a staple bar, not a whole one, which makes loading twice a chore. However, the speed and convenience more than make up for it. I wish it had a separate power supply as I keep the stapler in one general place but changing batteries is not a problem. Overall, a great little stapler and very capable for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Vibratek

customer_reviews.title: Its Bigger than it Looks. I'd Recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work ok, for a straight on staple, Not too good if you want to angle it., I will say, Its twice as big as i thought it would be..Its pretty substantial in size and weight.. the staple is about 1/2inch wide, and staples about 1/2" inch in.
customer_reviews.author: akonapet

customer_reviews.title: Spend a bit more money and get a better stapler.
customer_reviews.text: With brand new fully charged, re-chargeable batteries it starts blinking red after less than 24 hours. So of course that's only draining the batteries even faster. With batteries that worked fine in other electronic devices, it blinked immediately. Clearly it's power sensor system is not up to snuff. Bought two of them, one wouldn't staple unless there were at least 3 sheets of paper - it's sensor was apparently not working well. Ended up spending more money for Swingline Rechargeable (S7048201) and it's a much better product. Granted it's $40 more, but the extra cost is worth it to have it work out of the box, be able to use power if needed and has it's own rechargeable battery system.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model of this too and the older model is much better than any of the newer ones. I don't know what they changed but they need to go back. My older model is staples much faster and better than any of these newer ones. These newer ones are so slow when it comes to stapling and it doesn't matter if it is plugged into the wall or you use battery, it doesn't even compare to my older one.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbrell Farms

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to order the correct staples. I was ...
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to order the correct staples. I was about to return it until I actually read the inner label that specifies the need for special staples. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Best Realtor Ever

customer_reviews.title: All the features you need in an electric stapler.
customer_reviews.text: I run a couple of school fundraisers so an electric stapler is a must have for collating 400+ copies. This is a quality product and having the flexibility to use a cord or batteries is very helpful. Adjusting how far in the staple goes is an added perk.
customer_reviews.author: momofQ&D

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking all around town for an electric stapler and they were upwards of 40 bucks. When I found this one and saw the reviews I decided to go a head and try it. It works pretty well for the most part. It has a hard time detecting the really thin carbon papers and it causes me to have to jam the paper into the stapler to detect it. It only takes 20 staples and if you staple a lot the reloading might get a little tedious. For my purpose it works really well for the price.
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Got this for a co worker since we staple a LOT..... It has worked for 7 months so far and withstood many many reloads of staples, and no jams when you use the correct staples for it. It's louder than mine, but still a good investment. Mine is the Swingline Optima and mine only jams when i knowingly try to staple a stack of more than 20 papers, just in case it might work.....
customer_reviews.author: A. Hames

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use; works great
customer_reviews.text: We have two of these at an accounting firm. They work great for up to about 18 pages. Rarely gets jamed and is not too hard to unjam when it does happen. The first one worked so well that we bought a second one. And they both get heavy daily use from processing tax returns. I will never again ever use a manual stapler. this has spoiled me for lif.e.
customer_reviews.author: Book Worm

customer_reviews.title: Must use non-rechargeable batteries
customer_reviews.text: Like others have complained, you have to use this stapler with non-rechargeable batteries, otherwise the red LED will blink constantly that the battery life is low. Doesn't mean you can't use rechargeable batteries though. You'd just have to endure that stupid light blinking constantly. Other than that, it's a great stapler for cheap that staples well.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: I have no complaints, I purchased because I just had surgery and can not hold or use a regular stapler at this time, I have had no problems, it is even (depending on paper weight) stapling 20-30 papers. Only down fall is it is a little louder than most electric staplers.
customer_reviews.author: Trish T.

customer_reviews.title: That it works
customer_reviews.text: It only staples a couple pages then jams..I went cheap but I am going to reorder a better one
customer_reviews.author: Trish Roberts/Julia Williams

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This thing saved me! I had to staple together 250 brochure packets in less than an hour and thank goodness I bought this stapler! It really saved my poor hands from having to hand staple everything AND it saved me a TON of time. I was able to get the project done on TIME!! Woo-hoo! Never jammed, did a fantastic job!
customer_reviews.author: Cherries

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: broke my wrist & needed an easy to use stapler for work. at first it did ok & was a big help but it stopped working a week ago, after less than two months of use. it barely staples anything & even when it does it’s after several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: QiQi Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Okay but was expecting better
customer_reviews.text: The back guide won’t stay in place so you can end up with a staple 3” into the document. Was expecting more from Swingline
customer_reviews.author: Achille F. Infusino

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler when it works
customer_reviews.text: Great stapler when it works. Unfortunately just after a couple months this stapler jammed. I managed to unjam it but it never worked right again. I tried to do a return but it was too late. So it was a waste of my money. Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Stay Warm & Cozy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and I bought this to use when I make packets. I love it! It's small enough to sit on my desk, isn't super loud and can easily staple 20 pages at a time. I've only had it about a month but it's my favorite purchase for my class so far. I took one star off because in order to use it with batteries it needs like 6 batteries. That being said, it's a great product at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this product before and loved it, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Fillippelli

customer_reviews.title: Good at first, but died within nine months.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this stapler but after eight months I started having problems with it...then it completely died. It was still under warranty but I would have been responsible for shipping. Purchased a different brand instead...one with a lifetime warranty and 24 hour turnaround when there's a problem.
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after a few months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a month or so. Even with new batteries, it stopped working already.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: not reccomended for office use, but home would work just fine!
customer_reviews.text: ok, Im not very happy with this product because it doesnt hold a lot of staples, you will need to refill a lot (in an office) I have not needed to staple 30 pages, the most I have stapled is like 10 ish, no problems so far, oh and its not deep, I prefur my staples to be a deeper, oh well. hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Ms. V

customer_reviews.title: Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I bought 5 of these in 2003 - 2004, they are still the favorites in the office, so much so they've slowly dissapeared and I'm down to 2. Unless the quality has gone down since my initial purchase, they shouldn't jam - ever. I'm buying a few additional ones and will update this review if the performance doesn't support my past experience.
customer_reviews.author: Techie Lawyer

customer_reviews.title: Crap don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Crap stapler worked great and the broke with in two weeks. Paper would constantly get stuck mind you I only stapled three papers together each time.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Amezcua

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler
customer_reviews.text: Great stapler for a great price! I bought this for my daughters kindergarten teacher and she loves it! The only ones I was finding in stores were costing close to $50! This one was a steal and can't beat the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Mamaof2

customer_reviews.title: Many years later, I still use this electric stapler ...
customer_reviews.text: Many years later, I still use this electric stapler at the law firm I work at! I've yet to even have to replace the batteries!
customer_reviews.author: aimboats

customer_reviews.title: office must have
customer_reviews.text: LOVE my automatic stapler! If you have an office with lots of paperwork - you NEED this in your life!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Strict

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in product
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this stapler. I had one for over 13 years and loved it. When in finally died I ordered another one and it is worthless. It has not worked right since the day I got it.
customer_reviews.author: BoyMom

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: I had to trough it away did not work for nothing very bad and made holes on my papers and did not work how so ever
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Carrasco

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: Product only lasted 1 week after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: travion64

customer_reviews.title: Automatic Stapler
customer_reviews.text: I Love it!!!! I collect coins and my hands can't staple anymore so this is wonderful! Light and with new batteries (4 AA) it goes through the bardboard squares like butter. I can staple a holder 3 times and the batteries last for about 250 coins... that's 750 staples before batteries go bad. To me it's worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Carla S.

customer_reviews.title: You touch it it stapers. It is great,
customer_reviews.text: I like it and I use it at my desk to staple papers. I am buying another for my home
customer_reviews.author: Mary Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Does the job perfectly! I bought the same exact stapler at Staples and paid almost twice the price. Actually will handle about 30 sheets of paper. No jamming, easy load. Light blinks when staples are love. Helps make my job a lot easier. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Quickly broke
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after a couple of uses. Could not return. I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money or time!
customer_reviews.text: Such a piece of junk, it never worked- not even once. Such a disappointment!
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Use it all the time; downside - holds less than a half-stick of staples. Udate
customer_reviews.text: Started to fail a month or so after using it weekly. The battery contacts are of poor quality and cause the stapler to fail mid-staple and jam. This failure is repetitive. Happens about every two weeks - have to re-bend the battery tabs back out to make contact with batteries. Poor design. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: but it is a quality machine and I enjoy using it at work
customer_reviews.text: I wish the reaction time was a split second quicker, but it is a quality machine and I enjoy using it at work!
customer_reviews.author: A. C.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stapler. Can be electric or run by battery
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stapler. Can be electric or run by battery. Almost silent sounding. You have a choice where you want the staple placed on the page. I really love this product. I have owned many electric staplers, all different prices. The is the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: ... had it for some time now and it works great, easy to load
customer_reviews.text: Have had it for some time now and it works great, easy to load, no problems at all!
customer_reviews.author: BCM Texas

customer_reviews.title: Defective after two months and minmal use
customer_reviews.text: I have only have this stapler for two months and now it will not work properly. In fact, it no longer does what it is supposed to do, staple papers together. I only used it twice. It also drains the batteries. You are better off buying a unit has a power pack.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: Nice little machine
customer_reviews.text: It was a little awkward at first getting the paper in but a little practice made it perfect. I staples hard.
customer_reviews.author: Barnum T

customer_reviews.title: Best Stapler --  You will love it.
customer_reviews.text: This product has performed exactly as advertised. I love it. Anyone looking for a good stapler that is portable, this is it... I use it everyday. don't let the cost scare you away. The product is sturdy and worth the price. I purchased other cheaper staplers that just broke and consistently jammed. Use the Swingline staples.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great product and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. I only purchased this one because my assistant insisted on having one after I've been using mine for over seven years. Great product and highly recommend. This seller followed through as stated. Highly recommend seller also.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Kept jamming
customer_reviews.text: This isn't a reliable stapler. It kept jamming every other time I used it. I'd have to open it up and fiddle with the staples and try again. Too much of a hassle so I sent it back and little upright Swingline Stapler.
customer_reviews.author: E. OConnor

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This version replaced a previous version that wasn't great, but at least they lasted much longer. I strongly recommend you do not purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hector Melendez

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy
customer_reviews.text: Two months in it jammed and won’t function. All efforts to clear have failed. Also very light weight so doesn’t hold steady for use. I absolutely would Not recommend
customer_reviews.author: DDH Canton

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Like
customer_reviews.text: Enables me to just slide in my stack of papers and it's stapled.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: How do you screw up a stapler this badly? ...
customer_reviews.text: How do you screw up a stapler this badly? It won't load without getting stuck half-open most of the time. If you can get it closed after loading it will either do nothing when you try and staple something or go crazy, stapling over and over until you can yank out the batteries. I'll be returning it and avoiding anything made by Swingline in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Grand Poobah

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: This stapler doesn't live up to it's hype. It is supposed to staple 20 pages and it doesn't come close. It's brand new, new batteries and it can't get beyond the mid-teens in terms of pages it can staple together. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Bob C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact stapler just a little slow at stapling
customer_reviews.text: Nice compact stapler just a little slow at stapling. In my line of work I need it to go a little faster. Seems like a delay in stapling
customer_reviews.author: helen villegas

customer_reviews.title: It seems like it wastes the batteries
customer_reviews.text: There us a red light that blinks on the fron all the time. It seems like it wastes the batteries, because batteries only last about a week in it compared to several months in my old stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Best stapler I have used ever.
customer_reviews.text: It is strange to say I love a stapler but so many that I have had in the past I have hated so I am thrilled with this product. It is quiet and it is not as big as I expected it to be. I really like the fact that it has both a power cord and that you can put batteries which I didn't know when I purchased it. All is all I can say that this was a great value and my favorite stapler ever. Recommend it. I used it for stapling raffle booklets made of cardstock and it went through 6 pieces like it was a simple piece of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Caldwell

customer_reviews.title: I'd purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this in my classroom for a couple of months now and it's working great. I just wish it held more staples, I have to refill it fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rooke

customer_reviews.title: Drains battery...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure but I think the blinking lights kills the batteries just after a week. I bought new batteries specifically for this stapler and it stopped working after just a week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works 7/10 times
customer_reviews.text: an automatic stapler that only senses the paper 7 out of 10 times is not a good buy
customer_reviews.author: Legnadibrom

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my sister for Christmas, she’s used it for less than a month and it doesn’t work all the time...sometimes it works, sometimes it doesn’t. Disappointing. Can’t return it because I bought it early and the return date has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela D. Raidel

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Works great - easy to refill staples - I would like it to be a little quieter but it isn't awful loud or anything - would definitely buy again and will recommend
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS USELESS PIECE OF TRASH
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT. It jammed on virtually all attempts to staple as few as 3 sheets of paper. USELESS. ANNOYING and the seller, Art Lobby would not give me a refund on it. Suggested I contact the manufacturer!! Save your money on this piece of trash.
customer_reviews.author: W. C. Head

customer_reviews.title: not working any more
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, used for 4 months now is not working, not very heavily use by daily.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a new one as I dropped my old one one time too many.
customer_reviews.author: Mathews, VA

customer_reviews.title: sweet stapler
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a christmas present for my mom. Its awesome and we use it daily. Cant ask for more out of a stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Oakes

customer_reviews.title: So far so good - good value
customer_reviews.text: Do a lot of stapling. The adjuster is some what flimsy and slips if you jam your paper in there. Eventually, I'm sure the 'stop' will fail, but as of several thousand one-after-another staples I'd be ok if it did. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BH (SO Cal)

customer_reviews.title: Wish the staple compartment was longer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for the office. One didn't work at all when we received it however I returned it and the next one works. I like it, the only thing I wish were different is the compartment for the staples, it isn't long enough for a normal row of staples so I have to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Henry

customer_reviews.title: Must need for home or work office!  East of not having to pick up a stapler.
customer_reviews.text: I have one of these at work and when I worked from my home office, I kept trying to stable things without my hand. Oops...it's not electric! Had to have one for home too!
customer_reviews.author: Kacy Smith

customer_reviews.title: No complaints
customer_reviews.text: The only moderately priced electric stapler I could find that had batteries and a power cord. But it's great. Perfect for somebody who staples occasionally to regularly.
customer_reviews.author: doebtown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for less than 1 day and it the motor went crazy when I attempted to staple 3 pages together. unplugged changed staples and nothing worke, kept whirring like a vacuum. Stay away from this one guys.
customer_reviews.author: Steph H.

customer_reviews.title: this! this thing here!!! this is ...
customer_reviews.text: this! this thing here!!! this is the sh*t! its so handy having this at work. it goes through plenty of papers and I haven't chngd the batteries yet. I bought the darn thing months ago and I use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: ಠ_ಠ - 👉👌

customer_reviews.title: Works really well
customer_reviews.text: It replaced another electric stapler that I'd had for over 10 years. I like the automatic function as I have severe arthritis in my hands which make the manual staplers hard to use. Does a really neat job with very little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Mainer

customer_reviews.title: They're great. I bought 6 for my office and love ...
customer_reviews.text: I worried that the price would mean these were flimsy and not quality. They're great. I bought 6 for my office and love that I can move it around on my desk without worrying about the power adapter cord pulling out.
customer_reviews.author: MrsRamirez

product_meta.title: Swingline Electric Stapler, Compact, Full Strip, 20 Sheet Capacity, AC Adapter or Battery Powered, Portable, Black (48200)
product_meta.description:
Style:Full StripThe Swingline Portable Electric Stapler is made of durable plastic for long-lasting performance. Features a convenient dual power option to run on an AC adapter or 6 AA batteries (not included; not compatible with rechargeable batteries). Staples up to 20 sheets at a time. For best results, use Swingline S.F. 4 staples. Portable stapler can be easily moved or kept in an area where an AC power outlet is unavailable. Includes an adjustable paper depth guide so it’s easy to choose the how far the staple is positioned from the edge of the paper. Holds a full strip of staples. Limited 2 year warranty.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Swingline
feature_bullets: PORTABLE USE – This electric stapler is perfect for stapling on the go. With its durable plastic design, it’s a great choice for business travel and portable use.
DUAL POWER – Stapler can run on two different power sources. Use an AC adapter to plug into the wall or use 6 AA batteries, sold separately. Not compatible with rechargeable batteries.

20 SHEET STAPLING – Perfect for everyday projects, this easy to use electric stapler holds a full strip of staples and fastens up to 20 sheets of paper. For best results, use Swingline S.F. 4 staples.
ACCURATE PLACEMENT – Get perfect placement every time. The stapler has an adjustable paper depth guide, so it’s easy to see exactly where the staple will be placed on the page.
BUILT TO LAST – Swingline stands behind their products. This stapler comes with a limited 2-year warranty to ensure your satisfaction.
